name: arcadedb (ArcadeData)
description: [项目级] ArcadeDB Multi-Model Database, one DBMS that supports SQL, Cypher, Gremlin, HTTP/JSON, MongoDB and Redis. ArcadeDB is a conceptual fork of OrientDB, the first Multi-Model DBMS. ArcadeDB supports Vector Embeddings.。来源: https://github.com/ArcadeData/arcadedb

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
ArcadeDB Multi-Model Database, one DBMS that supports SQL, Cypher, Gremlin, HTTP/JSON, MongoDB and Redis. ArcadeDB is a conceptual fork of OrientDB, the first Multi-Model DBMS. ArcadeDB supports Vector Embeddings.

来源: https://github.com/ArcadeData/arcadedb
语言: Java
Stars: 704
